body:
> For instance, here the German filter is applied, but recipes are filtered out if any of the locale values are de.

Do you mean that they're only included if any of the locales are German, rather than filtered out?

My expectation is that the locale filter shows only recipes that include the locale being filtered by, and excludes recipes that don't include the locale at all. I think I'm also implicitly expecting that there can be only one locale filter active at a time, but I didn't specific state that anyway. I _think_ that makes the most sense, but maybe not?
